No. -  2050/15 - WEDNESDAY ,  DECEMBER 20, 2017
EXTRAORDINARY
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART IV (B) : LOCAL GOVERNMENT
Notices under the Local Authorities Elections Ordinance
LOCAL  AUTHORITIES  ELECTIONS  ORDINANCE  (CHAPTER 262)
Notice under Section 4 (1)
IN terms of the powers vested in the Election Commission by Section  4 (1) of the Local Authorities Elections  Ordinance 
as amended by the Act, No. 24 of  1987, we by this notice, do appoint the officers referred to in Column II of the Schedule 
hereto as Assistan t Returning Officers to assist the Retu rning Officers of the Administrative District referred to in  the 
corresponding  Column I th ereof for the pu rpose of the Local Autho rities  Election to be held on 10.0 2.2018.
1A
This Gazette Exrraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
